column4: I wish to install desktop ubuntu 11.10 on ubuntu 12.04 who can help me  ?
but I wish last desktop from ubuntu 11.10
allright I understand what u say but tell me how I do to replace currently desktop interface 12.04 with 11.10 tell me one tutorial please
they basically try to create the Gnome2 experience, but with new components.
I suggest you use KDE4.8.3, though.
google cinnamon install Ubuntu and follow instructions, I think.
there is no notion of shortcuts in Linux; there are symbolic and hardlinks.
there is the ln command for that: man ln for documentation.
